description:
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/types/typemap: a map whose keys are types.

go/types.Type has an equivalence relation (IsIdentical) that
is not consistent with its linguistic equivalence relation
(==).  Therefore extra work is required to build a map whose
keys are types.  This package does that work.

Has simple unit test.  More tests might be good.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

subject: code review 9501043: code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/types/typemap: a map whos...
